Unitron/Koga Shuko/Anubis/Hades/Nemesis Enforcer:

::Unitron yells loudly, the different barrages of lasers cutting into his 
back, the Predacon turning, firing a few shots off at each robot giving 
chase::

::A the missile hit the ground, Anbuis and Hades hit the ground, lasers 
passing overhead, though they quickly scramble to their feet and continue to 
retreat::

::Koga Shuko grunts as a stray shot hits him in the back, pointing his rifle 
backwards he fired off a few pot shots::

------------

::Nemesis jumped into the clearing, where the Alliance base, was, an 
explosion appearing right in front of him, sending him slamming ino the 
ground 50 feet away, Nemesis barely able to aim his rifle and fire off twenty 
rapid shots off at Scattershot::

::Scattershot yelped as a dozen blasts dug into his back, the robot crashing 
to the ground, raising his arms and yelling: "Don't shoot!  I wish to join 
you!  I wish to join you!"
